mdm.title: MDM Shazam
mdm.description: The goal of this project was to analyze an image to identify all the furniture present and match them with references from the "Maisons du Monde" catalog. If an exact match was unavailable, a similar reference was suggested to facilitate identification and purchase.(Down)

amazed.title: A-Mazed
amazed.description: The project aims to develop a strategy for multiple robots to navigate a maze as quickly as possible. The goal is to optimize their movements so that all robots reach the exit in the shortest time.

raytracer.title: Raytracer
raytracer.description: This project involves the creation of a rendering engine based on ray tracing, developed in C++. Ray tracing is a realistic rendering technique that simulates the path of light rays in a 3D scene. The goal is to generate photorealistic synthetic images by modeling the interactions between light, objects, and the camera.
